entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:15 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Matagami Airport 05:35 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
